replies.body: Why is Chiefs and Chiefs Black both allowed aren't sister/challenger teams not allowed
you can have a sister team if they're in the OCS but now they've gotten into OPL they'll be sold/given to another ORG, just like trident was from the Legacy org

Trident were looking pretty good at the end of last split and now Abyss have shot past them. Chiefs Black, whatever org they turn into, are poised to upset the scene if rumours of the upcoming talent in their team are true.
Hyped for split 2.
Disappointing that tgun is back in opl {{item:3070}} {{champion:53}}
